title: The Golden fish
creator_credit: Edmond Sechan and Jacques Cousteau Productions
brief_description: The story of a young boy who joyfully brings home his new pet. During the boy’s absence, the goldfish leaps out of his bowl, and is confronted by a sinister looking black cat who unexpectedly tosses the fish back into the bowl. Story by Roger Mauge. No dialogue.
